attributes.additional_details: Up to 400,000 farmed puppies are sold annually in the UK. Pet theft including by criminal gangs has risen by an estimated 250%. The RSPCA investigates more than 185,957 incidents per year. Up to 40,000 dogs are at risk of abandonment. 98% of vets are asked to euthanise healthy pets. The EU’s most profitable illegally traded commodities are drugs, arms and puppies. Cats Protection estimates there are 9 million stray and 1.5 million feral UK cats.
attributes.background: #PAWSLAW will introduce an Independent Animal Inspectorate, a National Pet Register (including DNA), stringent animal abuse and pet theft penalties and deterrents, a National Abusers Register, improved pet breeder licensing and a Minister for Animals.
